project_descr: It will focus on prevention of crime and violence by enhancing community cohesiveness and resilience through the use of multi-stakeholder dialogue, and livelihood interventions for youth through skills-training and employment opportunities.

outputs.output_descr: COMMUNITIES EMPOWERED AND SECURITY SECTOR INSTITUTIONS ENABLED FOR INCREASED CITIZEN SAFETY AND REDUCED LEVEL OF ARMED VIOLENCE.
